classes.name: Application
classes.description: Represents a Polar Application to be attached to the engine.

methods.name: pushLayer
methods.description: Add a new layer to the top of the current layers (Below overlays).

methods.name: pushOverlay
methods.description: Add a new overlay layer to the top of the current overlays (Above everything).

methods.name: start
methods.description: Starts the update loop of the application.

methods.name: stop
methods.description: Stops the update loop of the application.

classes.name: ApplicationSettings
classes.description: Settings for creating a new application.

properties.name: clearColor
properties.description: The background color of the surface.

properties.name: displayMode
properties.description: The display mode of the game engine.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the display surface.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the display surface.

classes.name: AtlasEntry
classes.description: Represents a single texture within a texture atlas.

properties.name: oversized
properties.description: Oversized tag on rectangle which is bigger than packer itself.

properties.name: rot
properties.description: Set the rotate tag of the rectangle.

methods.name: area
methods.description: Get the area (w * h) of the rectangle

methods.name: collide
methods.description: Test if the given rectangle collide with this rectangle.

methods.name: contain
methods.description: Test if this rectangle contains the given rectangle.

methods.name: Collide
methods.description: Test if two given rectangle collide each other

methods.name: Contain
methods.description: Test if the first rectangle contains the second one

classes.description: Represents the layout of a buffer.

methods.name: getComponentCount

methods.name: onDetach
methods.description: Called before the system is removed from the world manager.

classes.name: Component
classes.description:
Represents a collection of information about an entity used to define behavior.
Should contain no behavior or functionality, only data in the form of properties.

properties.name: type
properties.description:
Get the type of the component.
To be overridden in every component subclass to return a string unique to the component type.
Recommended format: '<Namespace>:<ComponentClassName>'.
Example: 'Sandbox:Goal'.

classes.name: ECSLoader
classes.description: No description available

classes.name: ECSState
classes.description: No description available

classes.name: Entity
classes.description: Represents a collection of components relating to a single entity in the world.

methods.name: addComponent
methods.description: Add a component to an entity.

methods.name: getComponent
methods.description: Get a component from an entity.

methods.name: hasComponent
methods.description:
Test if an entity has a component.
Note: Often it is better to use the 'subIndex' parameter within system.onEntityUpdate( ... ) { ... }.

methods.name: removeComponent
methods.description: Remove a component from an entity.

classes.name: Layer

methods.description: Called when the layer is attached to the application.

methods.description: Called when the layer is detached from the application.

classes.name: LayerStack
classes.description: No description available

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Called every update cycle. Updates the layer stack.

methods.name: popLayer
methods.description: Remove a layer from the layer stack.

methods.name: popOverlay
methods.description: Remove an overlay layer from the layer stack.

methods.name: pushLayer
methods.description: Push a layer onto the top of the other layers.

methods.name: pushOverlay
methods.description: Push an overlay layer on top of all other overlay layers.

classes.name: LightRenderer
classes.description: A static class which contains functions to draw lights to the 2D scene. The maximum number of lights usable in a scene is 10000.

methods.name: beginScene
methods.description: Begin the light renderer's scene. Only to be called by the Polar Renderer.

methods.name: endScene
methods.description: End the light renderer's scene. Only to be called by the Polar Renderer.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Multiply the two internal render buffers together and render to the currently bound FBO. Only to be called by the Polar Renderer.

methods.name: submitLight
methods.description: Submit a light to be rendered.

classes.name: OrthographicCamera
classes.description: Class representing an orthographic camera for use in a Polar scene.

methods.name: recalculateViewMatrix
methods.description: Recalculates the camera's view projection matrix.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The new world space position for the camera.

parameters.name: left
parameters.description: The left bound of the camera.

parameters.name: right
parameters.description: The right bound of the camera.

parameters.name: bottom
parameters.description: The bottom bound of the camera.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The top bound of the camera.

parameters.name: rotation
parameters.description: The new rotation for the camera.

parameters.name: left
parameters.description: The left bound of the camera.

parameters.name: right
parameters.description: The right bound of the camera.

parameters.name: bottom
parameters.description: The bottom bound of the camera.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: The top bound of the camera.

classes.name: OrthographicCameraController
classes.description: Class which controls the input and control of an orthographic camera.

methods.name: cameraTranslationSpeed
methods.description: A sigmoid function to calculate The speed of the camera at the specified zoom.

parameters.name: zoom
parameters.description: The current zoom of the camera.

methods.name: getCamera
methods.description: Get the internal camera controlled by the OrthographicCameraController.

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Update function to be called every frame to update the camera controller.

parameters.name: deltaTime
parameters.description: The elapsed time between the previous and current frame in seconds.

parameters.name: aspectRatio
parameters.description: The aspect ratio of the camera's view port. width / height.

classes.name: ParticleEmitter
classes.description: A class representing an emitter of particles, rendered through ParticleRenderer.

properties.name: angle
properties.description: The direction which the center of the spread releases particles in radians. Starts from the right going anticlockwise (like a unit circle).

properties.name: bornParticles
properties.description: The number of particles which have been born.

properties.name: buffers
properties.description: The vertex buffers used by the ParticleRenderer.

properties.name: fadeTime
properties.description:
How long it takes the particles fade.
The particles will have 100% opacity until the particle reaches the end of its life, where the opacity will be lowered for the specified time until it dies.

properties.name: gravity
properties.description: The acceleration applied to all particles.

properties.name: maxLife
properties.description: The maximum life of the particles.

properties.name: maxSpeed
properties.description: The maximum speed of the particles.

properties.name: minLife
properties.description: The minimum life of the particles.

properties.name: minSpeed
properties.description: The minimum speed of the particles.

properties.name: mode
properties.description: The mode of the particle emitter. Can be 'POINTS' or 'TEXTURE'

properties.name: numParticles
properties.description: The total number of particles which can be released by the emitter at one time.

properties.name: origin
properties.description: The position in the world where the particles are released.

properties.name: read
properties.description: The index to the current read buffer.

properties.name: scale
properties.description: The scale applied to the textured quad. Used in conjunction with mode 'TEXTURE'.

properties.name: shrinkTime
properties.description:
How long it takes the particles shrink to nothing.
The particles will have 100% size until the particle reaches the end of its life, where the size will be lowered for the specified time until it dies.
Used in conjunction with mode 'TEXTURE'.

properties.name: spawnRate
properties.description: The rate at which the particles are released, in particles per second.

properties.name: spread
properties.description: The spread angle of the released particles in radians.

properties.name: texture
properties.description: The texture to be rendered on the particle. Used in conjunction with mode 'TEXTURE'.

properties.name: vertexArrays
properties.description: The vertex arrays used by the ParticleRenderer.

properties.name: write
properties.description: The index to the current read buffer.

properties.name: zIndex
properties.description: The z-index of the rendering. Allows objects to be rendered on top of each other. The highest zIndex gets its pixels rendered on top.

classes.name: ParticleEmitterCP
classes.description: No description available

classes.name: ParticleEmitterSettings
classes.description: Settings for a particle emitter.

classes.name: PointLight
classes.description: Represents a point light which illuminates a 2D scene with lighting enabled.

properties.name: intensity
properties.description: The intensity of the light, from 0 to 1. If the value is raised above 1, the edges of the light will appear more bright and the center will not get brighter.

properties.name: transform
properties.description: The light's transform. The light's quad is 1x1 units and can be scaled or translated by manipulating this matrix.

classes.name: PostprocessingStage
classes.description: No description available

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Get the name of the stage.

methods.name: isEnabled
methods.description: Check if the stage is enabled.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the stage to the currently bound framebuffer.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The uniform's name within the shader.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value to set the uniform to.

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether the stage will be used when rendering.

parameters.name: uniforms
parameters.description: Fixed value uniforms used in the shader. Format: [name, [ShaderDataType, value]]
parameters.defaultValue: new Map<string, [ShaderDataType, number | glm.vec2 | glm.vec3 | glm.vec4 | glm.mat3 | glm.mat4 | boolean | Float32Array]>()

classes.name: System
classes.description:
Represents a behavior which is applied to entities' components.
Should contain no state / data.

properties.name: subscribers
properties.description: The system's subscribed entities. Format: [Entity ID: string, Subscriber Index: string]

methods.name: beginUpdate
methods.description: Called by the world manager at the start of an update cycle.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: Time elapsed since last update in seconds.

methods.name: endUpdate
methods.description: Called by the world manager at the end of an update cycle.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: Time elapsed since last update in seconds.

methods.description: Returns the component tuples for a system.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the system, unique to each system type.

methods.description: Called after the system is added to the world manager.

methods.name: onDetach
methods.description: Called before the system is removed from the world manager.

methods.name: onEntityUpdate
methods.description: Called every update for each entity subscribed to system.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: The elapsed time since the last frame in seconds.

parameters.name: subIndex
parameters.description: The index of the tuple which the entity subscribed to in System.getComponentTuples();

classes.name: Timer
classes.description: A utility used to check when a certain time has elapsed.

methods.name: getDelay
methods.description: Get the delay of the camera in seconds.

methods.name: getElapsed
methods.description: Get the elapsed time in seconds.

methods.name: getPercentage
methods.description: Get the completion percentage of the timer between 0 and 1.

methods.description: Set the time it will take until the timer finishes / resets.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Update the timer and check to see if it is completed.

parameters.name: deltaTime
parameters.description: The time elapsed since the previous frame.

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: How long the timer takes to complete in seconds.

parameters.name: completionValue
parameters.description: The value the timer update will return once the timer is completed.

parameters.name: repeat
parameters.description: Whether the timer will reset and repeat on completion.

methods.name: unbind
methods.description: Unbind the vertex array in OpenGL.

classes.name: VertexBuffer
classes.description: Represents an OpenGL vertex buffer.

classes.name: WorldManager
classes.description: Controls and manages the entity component system of a world.

methods.name: addSingleton
methods.description: Add a singleton component to the ECS manager.

methods.name: addSystem
methods.description: Add a system to the world.

methods.name: createEntity
methods.description: Add an empty entity to the world.

methods.name: getEntityById
methods.description: Get an entity from the manager using its ID.

methods.name: getSingleton
methods.description: Get a singleton component from the manager.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: The time elapsed since the last frame in seconds.

methods.name: recalculateAllSubscribers
methods.description:
Recalculates all entity subscribers.
High performance cost - use sparingly.
To be used if a new system is added after the entities, or for debug.

methods.name: registerComponents
methods.description: Recalculates the systems which are subscribed to this entity.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: The entity to be subscribed to the appropriate systems.

methods.name: removeEntityById
methods.description: Removes an entity by its ID.

methods.name: removeEntitySubscriptions
methods.description:
Removes the entity from all system subscriptions.
Stops the entity from being updated.

methods.name: removeSystemByName
methods.description: Remove a system through its name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the system, the overridden return value of System.getName().
